definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Dunga had been in charge of his country since 2006, succeeding Carlos Alberto Parreira.
sentences.chinese: 鄧加在06年取代佩雷拉成爲國家隊主帥至今。

sentences.english: The national squad are holding training camp in Beijing to prepare for the Asian Championship.
sentences.chinese: 國家隊爲了備戰亞錦賽，在北京舉行訓練營。

sentences.english: However, Nani will miss Portugal's trip to Liechtenstein after sustaining a shoulder injury.
sentences.chinese: 不過納尼因爲肩膀受傷不能去國家隊報到了。

sentences.english: I'm still fighting to get fit again but I'm not far away from hopefully being involved in the England set-up again.
sentences.chinese: 我依舊在對抗傷病，但我有信心重返國家隊。

sentences.english: I have been a member for a long time and I was also the captain.
sentences.chinese: 我曾一直是國家隊一員，甚至當過隊長。

sentences.english: Marco, Frank and I had won the 1988 European Championship with Holland.
sentences.chinese: 我們三個1988年隨國家隊拿了歐洲盃。

sentences.english: The two national teams will play a friendly next Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 下星期六這兩個國家隊會打一場友誼賽。

sentences.english: Khalid Boulahrouz receives his first call-up for Holland as a Chelsea player.
sentences.chinese: 布拉魯茲在轉會到切爾西以後第一次入選了國家隊。

sentences.english: On current form, Linke deserves to retain his Germany place.
sentences.chinese: 就現在的狀態來說，林克應當保有國家隊的位置。

sentences.english: I like the footballer Emmanuel Adebayor and I like the Togolese team.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡阿德巴約，我也喜歡多哥國家隊。

sentences.english: I have been proud to be a member of the national diving squad.
sentences.chinese: 一直以來，我都以自己是跳水國家隊隊員而自豪。

sentences.english: Greaves notched 44 goals in his 57 internationals.
sentences.chinese: 格里夫斯在他的57場國家隊比賽中射入44球。

sentences.english: Sotirios Kyrgiakos has announced his retirement from international football with Greece.
sentences.chinese: 吉爾吉亞科斯決定正式從希臘國家隊中退役。

sentences.english: Bernd-Schneider : Bayer Leverkusen and the German national team.
sentences.chinese: 拜爾勒沃庫森隊和德國國家隊。

sentences.english: Card also selected the latest test of the German national team.
sentences.chinese: 卡考也入選了最新一期的德國國家隊。

sentences.english: I am sure that sooner or later they too will be part of the Nazionale.
sentences.chinese: 我相信，他們遲早有一天會成爲國家隊重要的一員。

definition: (in classical literature) young military officer of high rank for his age/(during the Cultural Revolution) young militant in the Red Guard/(in modern usage) rising star (in sport, politics etc)
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
(sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
to heal a wound/to recuperate (from an injury)
